data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gPQgVplA29IQ7kNvgEUW4ab&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB6fMvK1OssDnG7HMHo1cMcO5jMQ4j40m_Nbyxu5Z6Kcg&oe=66B3364C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=b6ymYXlH_HYQ7kNvgFY2VcO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDV5od8Ppce3EIqC0-gqhvJzC7jH45n8cXfkpCz0fIyjw&oe=66B36C9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XJeUqvU9m-MQ7kNvgHfAPvB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCwPyw9_PHQ443oFuzf7uHO146ONzjSVXgp9V6ZNLGDGg&oe=66B351F1)
